title: Sports Center
titleDescription: Sports Center | Olga Golant | Architect | Visualizations | Graphics | Portfolio site | Varna, Bulgaria
shortDescription: The Business Hotel is situated in the city Varna between bul. “Primorski Polk” and bul. “Vasil Levski”. The situation of the building predisposes for...
longDescription: There is a sewer connecting the Black Sea with Lake Varna on the right side of the building. The region is suitable for sports activities. The project aims to combine nature, new technologies, unique lighting opportunities, and organic architecture shapes. The whole idea is inspired by the fact that the building is situated so close to the water but even more because of its lack of this type of buildings. One of the leading sports that will be practised there is swimming.  The building's silhouette elegantly blends in with its surroundings while creating the feeling of the slightly hilly area and a lush sea.
